bug.author: cdraper-CS
bug.description:
/kind bug
First I tried to install following the instructions here: <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/started/getting-started-minikube/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/started/getting-started-minikube/</denchmark-link>
They were clearly out of date and although I finally got 0.5.1 working, I could not install 0.6.1. Then I tried: <denchmark-code>minikube start KUBEFLOW_REPO=$(pwd) kfctl init localapp --platform minikube cd localapp kfctl generate all kfctl apply all Error: couldn't apply KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: kfApp Apply failed for kustomize: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: couldn't create resources from application Error: StatefulSet.apps "application-controller-stateful-set" is invalid: [spec.selector: Required value, spec.template.metadata.labels: Invalid value: map[string]string(nil): `selector` does not match template `labels`] </denchmark-code>
I tried rerunning the and got the issue noted in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3810>#3810</denchmark-link> . Removing the resource yaml and trying again got me back to the original error. What did you expect to happen: Successful install of kubeflow Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): manifests has 0.6.1-rc.2 kfctl version: v0.6.1-rc.2-1-g3a37cbc6 Kubernetes platform: minikube Kubernetes version: 1.14 OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): MacOS 10.14.6

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.97. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Hi, Have you ever met issue similiar to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3813>#3813</denchmark-link> while installing 0.5.1? Thx.

If you want to install on minikube instead of using platform I would suggest starting minikube and then following the instructions for installing on an existing cluster. Here are updated instructions (sorry the PR hasn't merged yet) <denchmark-link:https://deploy-preview-977--competent-brattain-de2d6d.netlify.com/docs/k8s/>https://deploy-preview-977--competent-brattain-de2d6d.netlify.com/docs/k8s/</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kkasravi>@kkasravi</denchmark-link> the error <denchmark-code>Error: couldn't apply KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: kfApp Apply failed for kustomize: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: couldn't create resources from application Error: StatefulSet.apps "application-controller-stateful-set" is invalid: [spec.selector: Required value, spec.template.metadata.labels: Invalid value: map[string]string(nil): `selector` does not match template `labels`] </denchmark-code>
Looks like a problem in the kustomize manifest for the application controller. Is there a bug in the manifest? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/application/application/base/stateful-set.yaml>https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/application/application/base/stateful-set.yaml</denchmark-link>
It doesn't look like we specify any labels or a selector. It does look like we apply some commonLabels in one of the overlays <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/application/application/overlays/application/kustomization.yaml>https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/application/application/overlays/application/kustomization.yaml</denchmark-link>
It looks like GCP config is using that overlay
kubeflow/bootstrap/config/kfctl_gcp_iap.yaml
Line 51 in b229c1b
- application
So I suspect that is the problem.

not fully onboard with the code structure yet so please forgive any blatant ignorance: don't you need a selector (or labels) for a StatefulSet? <denchmark-link:https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/generated/kubernetes-api/v1.11/#statefulsetspec-v1beta1-apps>spec here</denchmark-link>
Please check the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/metacontroller/base/stateful-set.yaml>metacontroller</denchmark-link> base as well:

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xaniasd>@xaniasd</denchmark-link> yes the selector is currently applied via an overlay and not part of the base kustomize package. So I think the fix is to add it to the base here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/application/application/base/stateful-set.yaml>https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/application/application/base/stateful-set.yaml</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xaniasd>@xaniasd</denchmark-link> Want to submit a PR to fix it?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xaniasd>@xaniasd</denchmark-link> , not sure where I am doing the mistake, but I am still facing the same issue. Any suggestions pls? couldn't apply KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: kfApp Apply failed for kustomize: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: couldn't create resources from application Error: no matches for kind "Application" in version "app.k8s.io/v1beta1" minikube version: v1.1.0 kfctl v0.6.1-rc.2-1-g3a37cbc6 kubectl version 1.14
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nkumar15>@nkumar15</denchmark-link> , it seems to be a different error message.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xaniasd>@xaniasd</denchmark-link> , should I open a separate issue for it? I see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3954>#3954</denchmark-link> is closed citing <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3812>#3812</denchmark-link> as duplicate.
